author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

First attempt to reorganize and make more readable the DQM Sequence definition. 
Some cleanup from unneeded TauValidation has been introduced

#### PR validation:

Tested with runTheMatrix.py -l all -i all --ibeos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

NO backport foreseen. Cleaning targeting Run3
title: DQM Sequence central clean up
